channel.title: 317 help please!
channel.description: Does anyone know what the pickup/item command is? I can figure it out.. Sadly I only know how to do it on a 508 :L

item.title: 317 help please!
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

::pickup itemid

Or do you mean the actual code?

  if(command.startsWith("pickup")) { // works for everyone etc..
                        String[] args = command.split(" ");
                 if(args.length == 3) {
                        int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
                        int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
                        if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) {
                                addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
                        } else {
                                sM("No such item.");
                        }
                } else {
                        sM("Oops! Use as ::pickup 995 100");
                } // credits to random place I got this from

Read full topic
